body: Hi Kristoffer, 1. If you like to create them surface by surface then you are on the right track. You can use Honeybee_createHBZones to create a thermalZone out of this surfaces with the current data. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4hNukqhfhE3y1PekcIdeRZJZBRWxBTZxCgRYmTD85rfiNpXwjklYRPAvHUeQH9oCsyZ-ccs0xO6WzYcPo9R5GB9hlfYWQpzJ/ZoneFromSurfaces.png) 2. You can use Mass2Zone component and then change the materials for each type (e.g. walls, windows, etc). [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/4hNukqhfhE0kgRgqvhtbiH4pUFCdqfjSfWzNtfoXmlVimgREBpW4B8TSa23ttHU7pB8e0rdazX7goG6hLY6o5eEdQudb*HDr/changeZoneConstruction.png) I hope it helps, Mostapha
